# CsvSerializer&lt;TTargetType&gt;.AlwaysWriteQualifier property

True if should wrap every field in the [`Qualifier`](Qualifier.md) during serialization. If false, then the qualifier is only written if the field contains the [`Delimiter`](Delimiter.md).

```csharp
public bool AlwaysWriteQualifier { get; set; }
```
